docs.title: ER Diagram
docs.text:
erDiagram
Institution {
    string name  
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
Practitioner {
    string name  
    string email  
    string description  
    string title  
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
Record {
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}

Practitioner ||--|o Institution : "institution"
